channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ICE's new policy limiting congressional oversight visits survives court challenge
item.description: A federal judge has delivered a significant victory to ICE, refusing to halt the agency's new policy limiting the ability of members of Congress to co...

item.title: Youngkin’s ‘Common Sense’ Legacy in Virginia
item.description: Glenn Youngkin’s single term was easily one of the most successful of any governor in recent memory.

item.title: Trump at Year One
item.description: The president has governed at a frenzied pace that has produced some real successes, but he also exceeded his authority to advance harebrained ideas.

item.title: Judge refuses to block new DHS policy limiting Congress members' access to ICE facilities

item.title: Education Remains the Key to Good Citizenship
item.description: No matter whether you’re an immigrant or a native-born American, education instills the love of country that we all ought to have.

item.title: Let the Pro-Life Movement Declare Independence
item.description: The Republican Party’s leadership has made its choice. Pro-lifers need to make theirs.

item.title: Only Government Force Can Stop Democrats From Plunging America Into Darkness
item.description: Democrats created the situation America finds itself in, and only a forceful crackdown on leftist anarchy will restore cultural stability.

item.title: It’s Time to Ditch ‘Disparate Impact Theory’ — and Biden’s Weaponization of Civil Rights Law
item.description: HUD has proposed a rule to end the agency’s use of this pernicious legal doctrine.

item.title: Like Don Lemon, Our Entire Corporate Press Is Literally Just Doing Far-Left Activism
item.description: The corporate media apparatus proves time and time again that it is merely a communication arm of the left.

item.title: The World Economic Forum Is A Glorified HOA For Leftist ‘Experts’ And Rich Communists
item.description: The World Economic Forum has become a globalist deep state with tentacles reaching the highest levels of government throughout the West.
